00009 #define dbg_putchar rs232_put
00010

00012 
00013 #define dbg_printf(...) do { \
00014                         sprintf(rs232_buffer, __VA_ARGS__); \
00015                         rs232_send(rs232_buffer, strlen(rs232_buffer)); \
00016                 } while (0);
